| HistoryText             = The Burrowers were a group of the [[Inhomo supremis|Inhumans]] known for their ability to burrow almost anywhere.

They were loyal to the [[Genetic Council (Earth-616)|Genetic Council]], and were among the [[Uys (Earth-616)|Seeker's]] minions sent to Earth to recover [[Ahura Boltagon (Earth-616)|Ahura Boltagon]] and turn him over to the council. This attempt was opposed by both the [[House of Agon (Earth-616)|Inhuman Royal Family]] and the [[Fantastic Four (Earth-616)|Fantastic Four]]. The Burrowers were part of an assault on the [[Four Freedoms Plaza]] to recapture Ahura. Both groups ensured that young Ahura remained with is parents instead of being used as a test subject for insidious purposes at the hands of the Council. {{r|Fantastic Four Unlimited #2}}
